title: Searching in South America
description: Searching in South America is the inspirational story of one man's journey to better understand the world - and ultimately himself – through challenging adventures and chance encounters across six countries in South America.From finding himself lost amidst the chaos of a midnight journey in the favelas of Rio, to reflecting on life while exploring the Amazon with a group of eighty year-olds, to tasting the bitterness of circumstance with Bolivian miners in the world’s highest city – this is a book filled with excitement, laughter and lessons you won't soon forget.
author: Uri Pomerantz
